kreport.name: replyRate_fb

condition.name: deptId
condition.extend: select v_o.id,v_o.org_name from v_org v_o where v_o.area in(${s@user_areas}) and v_o.type='分部' order by v_o.type_order,v_o.org_order

condition.name: area
condition.extend: select d.dvalue,d.dname from sys_data_dictionary d where d.dgroup='区域' order by d.ordernum

data.tbody: ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6}%

kreport.ksql: select jd.org_name 部门, jd.executergroupname 处理组, jd.total 接单数, nvl(hd.total,0) 回单数, round(jd.timetatal/jd.total,2) "平均处理时间(分钟)", round(nvl(hd.total,0)*100/jd.total,2) 处理率 from( select o2.org_name||n.executergroupname ids,o2.org_order,o2.org_name,n.executergroupname,count(distinct f.flowlsh) total,sum(nr.used_time)/60000 timetatal from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,chk_assessment_result_node nr,sec_org o1,v_org o2 where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and n.nodelsh=nr.rec_node_id and o1.id=n.executergrouporgid and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode not in ('86c9dd900a11226800316ae4eb406c1e','870bb7f90a11226801f8cfbbeebbcb95') and o2.area in(${s@user_areas}) and o1.org_code like o2.org_code||decode(o2.org_code,'000110000003','','%') and o2.type='分部' #[and o2.id=${deptId}] #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}] group by o2.org_order,o2.org_name,n.executergroupname )jd, ( select o2.org_name||n.executergroupname ids,o2.org_order,o2.org_name,n.executergroupname,count(distinct f.flowlsh) total from rec_flow f,ins_frm_fault i,rec_node n,sec_org o1,v_org o2 where f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and o1.id=n.executergrouporgid and f.status!='XJ' and n.nodecode not in ('86c9dd900a11226800316ae4eb406c1e','870bb7f90a11226801f8cfbbeebbcb95') and o2.area in(${s@user_areas}) and o1.org_code like o2.org_code||decode(o2.org_code,'000110000003','','%') and o2.type='分部' #[and o2.id=${deptId}] #[and f.startercode ${startercode}] #[and f.startercode=${type10000}] #[and i.area=${area}] #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}] and exists( select 1 from rec_node n2 where n2.flowlsh=f.flowlsh and n2.prenodelsh=n.nodelsh and n2.preroutecode in (select fr.routecode from flw_route fr where fr.routename like '%回单%' ) ) group by o2.org_order,o2.org_name,n.executergroupname )hd where jd.ids=hd.ids(+)
kreport.comment: 报表说明： 1) 处理率=回单数/接单数×100%
